description: This version of the  Person Playing Handball emoji has the  Medium-dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Dark Brown Skin Tone
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a dynamic individual mid-action, their medium-dark skin tone rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The figure is captured with a sense of athletic grace, their body angled as if powerfully throwing or catching a handball, the ball itself a subtle, rounded shape. This emoji, presented with Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges, conveys energy, sport, and active participation, perfect for illustrating fitness or a game played with friends.
